name: Peyote Coyote and the Desert of Dissipation
name_original: Peyote Coyote and the Desert of Dissipation
description:
Peyote coyote and the Desert of D  is an 3 act experiences which is about the coyote (player) understanding his own internalised toxicity seeing and reflecting on the reality of it, and accepting that you cannot fix the problem by your self - you need help.

This is the final act of the Coyote's adventure which is the acceptance of the problem.

For the previous acts:

Act 1 : https://robert-dantoni.itch.io/peyote-coyote-and-the-desert-of-deprivation

Act 2: https://mercworm.itch.io/peyote-coyote-and-the-desert-of-depuration

STONEWAX productions for creating the audio between all acts, check them out below

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvNmT_WfNFgUCM_nfGCoo7Q
